unnormalised: Remember to keep your roll number 12345 safe for all college related work. Your employee ID, EmpID 9876, will be needed for accessing the company portal after you join.
normalised: Remember to keep your roll number one two three four five safe for all college related work. Your employee I-D, E-M-P-I-D nine eight seven six, will be needed for accessing the company portal after you join.
